itemDisplayName: Deploy Windows VMSS configure windows featurtes SSL DSC
description: This template allows you to deploy two Windows VMSS, configure windows featurtes like ike IIS/Web Role, IIS Management service and tools, .Net Framework 4.5, Custom loggin, request monitoring, http tracking, windows auth, application initialization, download application deployment packages, URL Rewrite & SSL configuration using DSC and Azure Key Vault
summary: This template deploys two Windows VMSS, configures windows featurtes like ike IIS/Web Role, IIS Management service and tools, .Net Framework 4.5, Custom loggin, request monitoring, http tracking, windows auth, application initialization, download application deployment packages, URL Rewrite & SSL configuration using DSC and Azure Key Vault
